website_summaries.verdict: A 2-piece set that provides a firm and durable base for all your poses, with a soft, comfortable grip.
cons: Some have arrived damaged or with flaws
A few people report an initial chemical smell

customer_reviews.title: Bought for not yoga blocks, as described, worked awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These blocks were as described but admittedly bought them for a different purpose than yoga blocks so not sure of that application BUT they looked perfect. Bought them to brace / cushion loose bed frame against wall to prevent damage to the wall. Worked better than expected, the yoga block texture grips the wall a bit, perfectly fits behind the framing so it nestles in and is hidden, completely absorbs pressure so the bed doesn’t squeak and the wall stays in tact. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mom the Bomb dot com

customer_reviews.title: not crazy about these
customer_reviews.text: Not so crazy about these. Lots of imperfections on the cut edges. Density feels inconsistent... some parts of the block squish in really easily (I can make visible indented fingerprints) while other spots don't. Color is as depicted (Rose). On the plus side, they were inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: E Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Firm
customer_reviews.text: So I didnt really pay much attention to the dimensions because I just wanted something cheap but that would do the trick. I'm new to yoga and just do stretches at home. I'm also pregnant and needed a block to sit on for my stretches. These are a bit thicker than I would like but that's ok they'll still work. They're very firm which is good I think. Also it came in a 2 pack which I found extremely awesome since I sat on one and it wasnt quit wide enough so I put them together and it works perfectly. There was one tiny imperfection on one of the blocks but they're foam so it's no big deal to me
customer_reviews.author: Audra dannhaus

customer_reviews.title: Great because they are easier on wrists than floor yoga
customer_reviews.text: Love these as they make yoga much easier on my wrists....floor is too hard with body weight on hands and wrists...try them, you may find them helpful for this issue.
customer_reviews.author: B. L. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: These are a perfect medium density block, with a soft "give" which makes them comfortable to lean into without compromising stability; medium weight which makes them easy to hold and move through poses with ease. There is no odor to them; the price could not be better; appreciate the color choices.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great price, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are much cheaper for a two-pack than at places like Target or fitness/sporting goods stores. One block at Target is the same price as these two and these do the same job. They're lightweight but are capable of carrying a lot of weight. I have even stacked them on top of each other because I'm still learning yoga and they were sturdy, didn't slip, and provided extra comfort for me in the stretching. Definitely worth a purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sigman

customer_reviews.title: Great for yoga and also good as door stops
customer_reviews.text: I originally got these for yoga and meditation, and they work just fine for those purposes. Then I discovered that they work well as door stops. Now we slide a block under heavy bi-fold doors on the lanai (porch) keeping them in an open position. Previously, we used custom-cut wood blocks as stops, but they deteriorated in the rain and got a little slimy. The yoga blocks are much prettier, lighter weight, and can be cut to size with a table saw or perhaps an electric carving knife. When cut, you can see that the block is uniformly dense. Recommend, multi-purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Honuette

customer_reviews.title: Great Yoga Blocks 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: These yoga blocks are perfect for the price. Yes you will get a slight indent when you place your hands on them or you an object on them but they bounce right back to normal. The blocks are soft enough to where when you place your hands or stomach on them it is comfortable and not too hard. Yoga blocks should not hurt any part of the body or make it uncomfortable. The blocks are not spongy like memory foam they really are a good set of blocks and I would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Best blocks ever!
customer_reviews.text: I teach senior chair yoga, so why do I need blocks? One female is so short, her feet don’t reach the floor when sitting. I use these blocks under her feet. Another lady is so stiff she can barely do a standing side stretch even with the chair as an assist. Again I use the blocks to “raise” the chair seat up to her ability. As a volunteer instructor at a senior center, I have to pay for my own supplies. Therefore the price of supplies is very important. These blocks are an amazing value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Maraleta

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I like these blocks so much that I returned to buy ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I like these blocks so much that I returned to buy another pair so we both have our own blocks. Our practice is now more productive and comfortable- we can maintain poses much longer and feel more confident attempting new poses. These blocks are firm without being extremely hard, so they are comfortable to sit on for extended periods. I just wish I'd bought these sooner. Five stars for these excellent blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna HendricksonTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have high expectations for these blocks as they seemed to be too lightweight to be sturdy. But so far, I'm wrong! They are sturdy considering in one of the yoga poses I've been practicing I'm putting more than 50% of my weight on them. They are also helpful in making me stretch a little further than I would without them. As I slowly progress to add new poses to try, I'm also finding new ways to incorporate these blocks to aid my practice. They are very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: FrugalNut

customer_reviews.title: Good support
customer_reviews.text: I’ve recently gotten into doing yoga at home, but sometimes I attempt a workout video that’s a little too bendy for me. These help a lot in improving stability. They're still soft touch foam, but they’re dense enough not to collapse under my weight. Neither do they feel like a rough & unyielding brick when I’m learning a new position or need the support. A great tool to have and coming as a pair is great.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay M.

customer_reviews.title: Use these between long bed frame and shorter mattress - wrok well.
customer_reviews.text: Our pedestal bed frame is supposedly a California King, but the frame is about 4" longer than a CA King mattress for some reason. So I use a row of these between the mattress and frame to keep mattress in place. The only thing is - CATS! One of our cats loves to claw and chew on these yoga blocks, so we have to make sure heavy pillows cover the blocks when we are out of the room. (This same cat chews on my wife's foam-soled shoes also)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and soft yiga blocks
customer_reviews.text: I totally loved my yoga blocks! They are soft and have the perfect size. They are resistant enough for me to even step on them without breaking but strong enough to hold me and help me achieve new yoga positions.
customer_reviews.author: Aesthetic nurse J

customer_reviews.title: Functional-nice looking- a little too lightweight for my taste
customer_reviews.text: Nice blocks - right size - a little lighter than others I have - I use them several times per week and they function fine. Good to have as extras - but I’d go with a heavier block if I only wanted one set around the house
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Nomad

customer_reviews.title: Decent, basic blocks
customer_reviews.text: They’re basic yoga blocks that have a nice little give to them instead of being brick solid. I ordered Rose Red and they’re actually hot pink, so if you’re picky about color, that’s the only issue. I’ll be keeping them.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy N.

customer_reviews.title: 2 is better than 1.
customer_reviews.text: They arrived on time and undamaged. I had only 1 brick and definitely should have gotten 2 to help with the yoga stretching. Tried them out and found they let me get into positions more stable, aligned and focused. Setting my 160lbs of weight on them didn't cause them to fold or roll.
customer_reviews.author: Temp

customer_reviews.title: Nice blocks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these blocks to use for stretching. They work really well- firm and can support my weight (140lbs) without any issues. They are soft to the touch so I don't think they would be very cleanable. I would recommend these as personal blocks (vs. shared at a gym, etc.). They arrived with some slight imperfections as shown in the photo but for the price, these are exactly what I was looking for. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Norton

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but low quality.
customer_reviews.text: There's a seam forming across the width at center of one of my blocks. At the same place there is a slight bend. I use these mainly for lunge twists. I weight 175 lbs. This is the second pair of two different brands/types, I've purchased here. Can't seem to find the same quality that they have at the yoga studios.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for Challenging Yoga Poses
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are great. I am enjoying using them during my in-home yoga practice. They are sturdy and attractive. I find them very helpful to make challenging poses, like pigeon pose, possible and more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dreyna

customer_reviews.title: They are what they say they are
customer_reviews.text: Yep... these are yoga blocks. One of them did come with a chunk out of it. Hard to tell when it happened, could have been the prime driver, manufacturer, somewhere in between. Either way, they are just for at joke yoga for a newbie during this weird time of having to be at home. Not the end of the world.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great blocks. Cheap and do the job!
customer_reviews.text: I love having my own blocks. These were affordable and I bring them sometimes to the studio when I know I am going to use them. I work at a studio and some people sweat like crazy on the blocks especially when they are placing their hands or body parts on them. You can steam them - but really I just got my own and keep them in my yoga bag. Great bargain and I love them for assisting me in held poses or using them to get my crow/crane to fly.
customer_reviews.author: Iconpyro

customer_reviews.title: Nice and firm and great quality
customer_reviews.text: These blocks won't be used for Yoga, but they do work perfect for supporting the bimini frame in the stored position on my boat. No more scratches from the tubing. Look like they will hold up great. Can even drill a hole easily and neatly for a lanyard. Much better than swim noodle type foam for this use. Now maybe I can even do Yoga on my boat.......
customer_reviews.author: Craig V. I.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect support and color!
customer_reviews.text: I had originally bought yoga blocks from somewhere else. I did not like the color at all. The photo did not represent what came. These are spot on for the perfect, calming color, and it makes me want to use them! They are lightweight and easy to use. The photo is very accurate for product color.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great Blocks!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband to replace smaller old blocks with ones that are like yoga studio blocks. These fit the bill and we both love them. If you like the typical blocks at your yoga studio you will like these. They are pretty much the same thing, without the high end yoga brand price.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value for something that is often overpriced. Get these if you are looking for yoga blocks!
customer_reviews.author: Little Mushroom

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: These are just as good as ones costing several times more. I am 190# and found them to be sturdy and did not slip or mush very much at the edges. I know there are a lot of other uses for these foam blocks, but mine is actually as intended: yoga. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: j76

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these yoga blocks to help improve my stretching. I noticed that my blocks had scrapes and cuts on them, something I wasn't too pleased about. But since these scratches don't hinder my use of them I am ok with it. I enjoy using them to improve my handstands, crow, and frog yoga poses.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: New to Yoga
customer_reviews.text: After I turned 50 moving became to hard and i was taking tons of Tylenol. My best made me start taking yoga and with 3 weeks the pain in my knees was minimal and I could move fir long amounts of time. The blocks help with stability. ..
customer_reviews.author: Franziska649

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap speaker stands for sound isolation!
customer_reviews.text: I use these as speaker stands for my 2.1 desk setup. They isolate the sound well, and raise the speakers to a more tolerable height. Not really their designed purpose, but they work none the less!
customer_reviews.author: Kasey M

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality yoga blocks that are holding up very well! My 7 year old daughter uses them daily for stretching and acro training. No rips, dents, or deformity so far after 3 months. Pretty great!
customer_reviews.author: Mamma Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Great value-Perfect for yoga instructors who have yoga studios
customer_reviews.text: While they are not super dense and heavy, they are quite adequate for postures like Ardha Chandrasana where you are putting weight on the block. I like the clean, neutral look. For the price, these are hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Blocks.  Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner so do not have to much to compare to, but these are really sturdy and have been perfect for me. I hate to admit it but I even used them to prop up furniture so I could apply felt feet. I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Janiene

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have used yoga blocks. These worked well and were not real hard. There was a small chemical smell when the package was first opened but I wiped them off with a disinfectant rag and the smell seems to have disappeared.
customer_reviews.author: Techie Nerd

customer_reviews.title: Good yoga blocks
customer_reviews.text: Not much else to say - they're blocks of foam cut in the right shape and size.
customer_reviews.author: Wham

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 sets--purple and blue. Lightweight, yet, strong enough to serve my modification needs.
customer_reviews.author: Janiece Marie

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive yoga blocks
customer_reviews.text: Hard to use until you get used to them. They are MUCH more comfortable than the harder type blocks when using them to support your body, but too squishy until you become accustomed to them.
customer_reviews.author: tonithecatfanatic

customer_reviews.title: Thinner than others and thinner than advertised
customer_reviews.text: If it matters to you, these are not a full 4" thick. They are 3-3/4". They do not match any of the other blocks I have. However, the other dimensions are accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Breeze

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: These blocks work fine for yoga. They are light and strong, the color is nice. I was only looking for one block when I was shopping but this set of two was a good price. I would recommend these blocks.
customer_reviews.author: JennyC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pair of blocks, solid and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I was definitely expecting these to be good based on previous reviews and they did not disappoint. Arrived quickly and the color is gorgeous, a perfect pink not too bright not dull either. I stand on them so I know they're worthy of holding a person's full bodyweight at 175lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Jam Brown

customer_reviews.title: as described on the catalog page
customer_reviews.text: these are the color and size i expected from the catalog page. i am able to use these as directed by the instructor. i am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DBS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect when a little extra stability is needed
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are lightweight and seem to be sturdy...I grab them when I feel a little unsure of balance or the depth of a yoga pose.
customer_reviews.author: K. T. Fletch

customer_reviews.title: Blocks had a heavy chemical smell on them. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Blocks had a heavy chemical smell on them. The scent got on my hands after I unwrapped the plastic wrapping.
customer_reviews.author: G Stone

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this item and this seller
customer_reviews.text: I'm a yoga beginner so I don't know a lot about yoga blocks. These seems very high quality and I am sure will last many years. I recommend this item and this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Not the color of a red rose.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the blocks are fine. They’ll work. Color is described as “rose red”. Bought them to match my rose red yoga mat... but uh, they sent me pink blocks. 🙄 When I buy a red rose, it doesn’t look pink. Not as described.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: These are marvelous for those of us who are still ...
customer_reviews.text: These are marvelous for those of us who are still aiming for our toes. Luckily I do not feel the need to push myself with these, I tend to get shin splits when I push to hard...
customer_reviews.author: jackie brown

customer_reviews.title: Too big. This is not they typical size block ...
customer_reviews.text: Too big. This is not they typical size block you find in most yoga studios. Should have paid attention to this.
customer_reviews.author: Brinson W Crews

customer_reviews.title: the material was really soft which was nice. But they squished down and made some poses ...
customer_reviews.text: The block came on time , the material was really soft which was nice. But they squished down and made some poses uncomfortable. This might just be a preference of mine, but I like more sturdy/solid blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Shannorbean

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Same size as the ones at my local studio. I don’t like using theirs because other people sweat all over them and sit on them. These are just what I needed, very stable while not too firm.
customer_reviews.author: DMcMurrian

customer_reviews.title: Nice yoga blocks -- the right size, solid, light and appear very durable
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints. They are better than I expected for the price. The seem well made and have been holding up well under moderate use. Exceed expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These yoga blocks are exactly what I expected. They are sturdy, get the job done and are affordable. I would purchase these again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product for exercises given to me for hips and ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product for exercises given to me for hips and legs by my Physical therapist. Strong, doesn't slide around, and handles all my weight on one foot on the block. Thx for developing it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Brownell

customer_reviews.title: Good Blocks
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are holding up really well and I'm not a small person. Would recommend for at home yoga practice.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kiddo approved!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to aid my preschooler in her yoga poses. She mainly uses them for everything but that including obstacle courses. Used and abused, they are holding up well!
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: great blocks, great value
customer_reviews.text: I feel very confident when using these. Lightweight and yet sturdy enough for support. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy She

customer_reviews.title: Great price for any Yogi
customer_reviews.text: And great blocks, as good as any I have ever used in any studio. Just ordered another set. I am getting my 200 hr. certification and building up my supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Firm support, soft enough to ease the impact on my wrists. I have post-injury arthritis in both wrists (and I'm only 30!) and these help me get my practice in without my wrists complaining at me! My cat chewed a corner almost immediately, so maybe keep them out of reach
customer_reviews.author: Meg M

customer_reviews.title: Desktop speaker stands
customer_reviews.text: Worked well as a way to raise my Kef bookshelf speakers, both to improve acoustics and to prevent my spilled coffee from hitting my speakers. Easier than any of the other DIY suggestions I've seen online.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I wanted and needed at home to help me get into some deeper stretches and yoga poses.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Bjoin

customer_reviews.title: ... some what roughly cut other than that they are fine. Be warned they are VERY pink
customer_reviews.text: The edges are some what roughly cut other than that they are fine. Be warned they are VERY pink ;0)
customer_reviews.author: S. Bullard

customer_reviews.title: Yoga blocks
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and very sturdy. Big help in certain poses. Glad I purchased them. Love the bright pink I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: SJB

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy and firmly soft. They are thicker than my previous blocks and I really find that helpful. They have no odor and do the trick
customer_reviews.author: B. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted for Yoga stretching exercises. Many other blocks are 3". I like this 4" block better.
customer_reviews.author: runningbarb

customer_reviews.title: Great, a little spendy.
customer_reviews.text: I love them and use them for a lot of different things other than just yoga. Like, a step to help me reach things or even just to put my feet up or sit in.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent yoga blocks. I like a larger block and these were perfect. Best blocks I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Surprised by how sturdy they were. Definitely helped with improving my posture. Would recommend to anyone who needs extra help with yoga/stretching.
customer_reviews.author: Janae

customer_reviews.title: These blocks are great and durable
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are great and durable, I use them to stretch and to work out with. Holds my weight up really well especially when doing splits on them to get passed 180.
customer_reviews.author: Betsa

customer_reviews.title: These are nice. Just soft enough but too soft
customer_reviews.text: These are nice. Just soft enough but too soft. I use them in my ab workouts and believe it or not learning to do a handstand.
customer_reviews.author: Jack D. Menendez

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and soft at the same time-perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I kept getting scared of the foam quality, I thought I’d be disappointed but I love these blocks! it’s my first set, and I’d definitely get another one if needed. They’re sturdy in despite of being foam, but are comfortable for diff yoga poses at the same time. It might scratch easily, but I mean, it’s foam! so it’s expected... fully satisfied :)
customer_reviews.author: Sunflowers4Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Working For Me
customer_reviews.text: Use at home for supporting yoga positions. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: C Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Great blocks
customer_reviews.text: it's good. Are real good blocks. Their sturdy, light and great!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Use as footrests
customer_reviews.text: I use these as footrests when sitting in camp chairs. They work great!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and do the trick.
customer_reviews.text: They do the trick nicely. Light weight, decent in appearance. One arrived a bit dented but it does not affect functionality. I did not detect any chemical smell.
customer_reviews.author: Verjeep

customer_reviews.title: This helps with when you have no flexibility
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Works as expected. Helps a beginner with different yoga moves.
customer_reviews.author: Tanesha

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and how they are made
customer_reviews.text: These are thicker than I need right now, but I'll have to figure out what thick blocks are used for. Love the color and how they are made.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my little yoga class in the library. Good quality and helpful for newbies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga tool for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for all levels of yoga training. It arrived quickly and was just what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Parmley

customer_reviews.title: Great blocks for a big guy
customer_reviews.text: Good block for the price. I am 270 lbs and these work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are well made, sturdy, and work perfectly well! Glad my family bought them for me for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: P. Parks

customer_reviews.title: I love them.
customer_reviews.text: I am short and stiff. The yoga blocks help me to do positions I could not do by myself. The blocks are very helpful. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Berry

customer_reviews.title: right fit
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly, any bigger and too big for my hands. Comfortable and sturdy. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: They are blocks
customer_reviews.text: They are yoga blocks. Not much more to say. Pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, firm, won’t fall apart. I believe they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Edington Top Contributor: Painting

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, good price, no strong odor.
customer_reviews.text: Nice blocks, great color choices! I ordered these because of the other reviews - other blocks were noted to have a strong odor, but not these. I would order these again.
customer_reviews.author: N. Mckay

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Yoga Blocks
customer_reviews.text: The product was just has described, seem like a good affordable option for yoga blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald D Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The blocks are light weight but sturdy and feel safe to support my weight. I’m really happy and satisfied with them!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: It’s an okay product
customer_reviews.text: I mean, what can I say? They’re sturdy but you can also use almost anything else to help with your stretching.
customer_reviews.author: Keyla Guevara

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga blocks
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It's firm enough for me to stand on for certain yoga poses. The colors look somewhat washed out in the photos, but they're actually solid.
customer_reviews.author: Young K.

customer_reviews.title: Good yoga blocks for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good yoga blocks for the price. Not as dense as the blocks most studios have, but that's a reasonable compromise for the great price!
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: A Yoga Teachers Friend
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for private sessions. These blocks are not to soft and provide my clients with stable comfortable support. Great price too
customer_reviews.author: Mark_Denver

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and did what I needed them to do. Sturdy and comfortable to use. Highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: P.S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A LITTLE BIGGER AND A LOT LIGHTER THAN THE CEDAR BLOCKS I WAS USEING
customer_reviews.author: William Henning

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Yoga Blocks!
customer_reviews.text: We love these blocks for our yoga practice. They are very well made and sturdy giving that often needed extra support during yoga or stretching practice.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Good Yoga Blocks
customer_reviews.text: During the pandemic, I wanted to have yoga blocks at home (since I can't go to my yoga classes in studio). These should do the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: I use them at the shooting range to support my Caldwell sandbags.
customer_reviews.text: Very light and firm as a brick or a piece of wood. I use them at the shooting range to support my Caldwell sandbags. Very lightweight and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Milonga

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: don't use them as yoga blocks but use them as rc car stands. for this their perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bang for your Buck
customer_reviews.text: Such a great set of yoga blocks at a great price. They do soak in some sweat but I don’t use them all that much except for Retorative Yoga and a few other moves so they’re perfect!
customer_reviews.author: mlb1015

customer_reviews.title: Light and pretty
customer_reviews.text: My teacher recommended blocks and I am happy with these. They are light and the color is good.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: New to yoga and these help me balance and keep proper form. Not too soft or too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Joli

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and price. My teenager uses the blocks while doing yoga.
customer_reviews.author: Jortney

product_meta.title: Fledo Yoga Blocks (Set of 2) 9"x6"x4" - EVA Foam Brick, Featherweight and Comfy - Provides Stability and Balance - Ideal for Exercise, Pilates, Workout, Fitness & Gym
feature_bullets: Improve Yoga Stretches - Designed to increase flexibility and improves alignment for deepening and elongate your stretches.
Premium Material - Made of durable & eco-friendly Eva foam for better support, balance and comfort.
Extra Support, Extra Large - Beveled edges provides firm, soft and comfortable grip, non-slip even sweat.
Lightweight and portable - Measuring 9"x6"x4", perfect for on-the-go, in the studio, or at home use.
Easy to Clean - Non-absorbent and moisture-proof to keep bacterial away!
